# Summary

<!-- What changed, and why? -->

## Checklist

- [ ] README / docs updated (if user-facing behavior changed)
- [ ] No secrets committed (`.env.local`, API keys, tokens)
- [ ] Lint / typecheck / tests pass locally
  - `npm run lint`
  - `npm run typecheck`
  - `npm test`
- [ ] No unnecessary nesting (guards + early return)
- [ ] No magic numbers (constants with intentful names)
- [ ] Names are explicit (no abbreviations)
